channel.title: Mini-Rant(Interfaces)
channel.description: Ok, just thought i'd go on a mini rant about interface development. Lin created the interface maker, so that you could all make nice new interfaces. But you all are missing the point. most of you are making interfaces which server ONE purpose. Like, many of the login screens i see. The sprites are built into the interface. Why not just make an entity that the end-user can change at their whim? Think about it. Most of the default interfaces were designed for one particular purpose, but was left abstract enough to be served as other purposes as they saw fit. Like the Quest interface. It is what i call an ActionList Interface. It's a list, with X elements, and each element sends a packet when it's clicked. Do you see that these days? No. You see login screens where everything is static, or unchangeable. Now, this may provide a type of faux "copyright", but honestly, can't you be a bit more creative. Can't you think more outside the box, than making an interface that takes up half the screen, but the content inside that frame only takes up maybe 1/4 of the frame's size? Honestly now, are you all, I don't know, mentally inept? Or is it really that difficult to come up with an interface that can be served for MULTIPLE purposes?

item.title: Mini-Rant(Interfaces)
item.dc:creator: @dragmagic dragmagic
item.description:
@dragmagic wrote:

[quote=“badger41, post:8, topic:333869”][quote author=dragmagic link=topic=430271.msg3163172#msg3163172 date=1269766519]

your argument is invalid.

if you wanna make interfaces how you say they should be made, go ahead, but we’re going to make interfaces however the fuck we want, kthxbai.

im pretty sure Zyle knows alot more about RSPS then you even will. also he likes everything to be perfect and make sense one thing he is totally agents is custom items

now this is where i call you an idiot.

  1. Never anywhere in my post did i say i was better than him in any way.
  2. I could care less if he was against customs, if customs were a bad thing there wouldnt be a whole couple boards on custom things (models etc)
  3. Nothing is perfect, even rs has flaws, so if he wants things to be perfect all the time thats his problem.
  4. This does not even deal with custom items, this is an interfaces rant.

and this is where i call you a fucking idiot and learn to read proper English. Not once did i say he was better then you so your #1 out of the question all i said was he knows more than you, and also the custom items was just an example and has absolutely nothing to do with this topic but was any example of one thing he does not like so please learn to read.
-Cousin of Zymus (a.k.a Zyle)

now ,|, off and have a nice day
[/quote]

nah dude…
you tried saying he knows more ‘than i ever will’ leaning on basically saying hes better than me.
I really dont care if he doesnt like customs, thats his problem, because another good chunk of the community loves customs.
If he wants to rant on how interfaces are made, he can go ahead, but its more than likely NOT going to affect anything.

btw, the middle finger is like this ,l,
YOU have a nice day sir.[/quote]

it cant be a middle finger with only four fingers

Read full topic
